content: सानु {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} A peak, summit, ridge; सानूनि गंधः सुरभीकरोति <ls>Ku. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Me. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 5</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 36.</ls> {@--2@} A level ground on the top of a mountain, table-land. {@--3@} A shoot, sprout. {@--4@} A forest, wood. {@--5@} A road. {@--6@} Any surface, point, end. {@--7@} A precipice. {@--8@} A gale of wind. {@--9@} A learned man. {@--10@} The sun.
